page_analysis.text_content:
Detached 2nd-dwelling units & associated parking site planning

Fig 41 Examples of site planning solutions for detached 2nd dwelling units and associated required parking

A Detached & separate from main-dwelling parking
• Main dwelling has a 1-car attached garage.
• 2nd dwelling has a 1-car detached garage. (Because it is detached and at least 75' from the front lot line, it may be located in the rear and side yards.)
• Both dwellings use driveway for their uncovered spaces (beyond front setback)

B Attached & separate from main-dwelling parking
• Main dwelling has 1-car attached garage.
• 2nd dwelling has a 1-car attached garage. (Because attached, it must be located with the building area rather than in the rear or side yards).
• Both dwellings use driveway for their uncovered spaces (beyond front setback)

C Detached & combined with main-dwelling parking
• Both dwellings share a 2-car detached garage. (Because it is detached and at least 75' from the front lot line, it may be located in the rear and side yards.)
• Both dwellings use the driveway for their respective uncovered spaces (beyond front setback)

D Combined w/ main-dwelling parking that is attached to main dwelling
• Both dwellings share a 2-car attached garage.
• Both dwellings use the driveway for their respective uncovered spaces (beyond front setback)

Interior lot example

Key
Curb
Lot line

Required setbacks

2nd-dwelling unit & associated pkg

visual_elements.description: Four side-by-side site planning diagrams labeled A, B, C, and D illustrating different configurations of detached 2nd dwelling units and associated parking. Each diagram shows a lot layout with a main dwelling, a detached 2nd dwelling unit (900 sf max), parking garages (1-car or 2-car, attached or detached), driveways, and buildable areas. Each diagram includes measurements such as '12' min.' setbacks and '3' min.' driveway widths. The diagrams use shading and patterns to differentiate buildable areas, dwellings, parking, sidewalks, curbs, lot lines, and uncovered spaces. Each diagram is titled with a description of the parking arrangement and dwelling relationship.
visual_elements.location: Middle of the page, spanning horizontally

visual_elements.description: Legend explaining symbols and patterns used in the diagrams: solid line for curb, dashed line for lot line, shaded pattern for sidewalk, dashed area for required setbacks, solid gray for dwelling, dashed gray for buildable area, solid black for 2nd-dwelling unit & associated parking, white for area that may not be used to satisfy required parking spaces, and a car icon for uncovered space.

technical_specifications.parameter: Minimum setback from main dwelling to 2nd dwelling
Minimum distance from front lot line for detached garages

technical_specifications.value: 1-car attached garage or 2-car attached garage depending on configuration
1-car detached garage, 1-car attached garage, or shared 2-car detached or attached garage depending on configuration

structural_elements.main_heading: Detached 2nd-dwelling units & associated parking site planning
subheadings: A Detached & separate from main-dwelling parking
B Attached & separate from main-dwelling parking
C Detached & combined with main-dwelling parking
D Combined w/ main-dwelling parking that is attached to main dwelling

additional_notes: Page number 45 at bottom right corner
No handwritten annotations or stamps detected
Text and diagrams are clear and legible
cross_references: Fig 41 referenced in the caption as example site planning solutions

qualifiers.text: Because it is detached and at least 75' from the front lot line, it may be located in the rear and side yards.
Because attached, it must be located with the building area rather than in the rear or side yards.

conditions.text: Both dwellings share a 2-car detached garage.
Both dwellings share a 2-car attached garage.
Both dwellings use driveway for their respective uncovered spaces (beyond front setback).

logical_relationships.expression: If 2nd dwelling has a 1-car detached garage, then it must be located at least 75' from the front lot line and may be located in rear and side yards.
If 2nd dwelling has a 1-car attached garage, then it must be located within the building area rather than rear or side yards.
Both dwellings share a 2-car detached garage AND both use driveway for uncovered spaces beyond front setback.
Both dwellings share a 2-car attached garage AND both use driveway for uncovered spaces beyond front setback.

execution_sequence.action: Evaluate if 2nd dwelling parking is detached garage and apply location qualifier q1
Evaluate if 2nd dwelling parking is attached garage and apply location qualifier q2
Evaluate shared detached garage parking and driveway use
Evaluate shared attached garage parking and driveway use
